verses.verse: Then all <S%H3605><s%> Israel <S%H3478><s%> gathered themselves <S%H6908><s%> to <S%H413><s%> David <S%H1732><s%> unto Hebron, <S%H2275><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%> Behold, <S%H2009><s%> we <S%H587><s%> are thy bone <S%H6106><s%> and thy flesh. <S%H1320><s%>

And moreover <S%H1571><s%> in time past, <S%H8543><s%> <S%H1571><s%> <S%H8032><s%> even <S%H1571><s%> when Saul <S%H7586><s%> was <S%H1961><s%> king, <S%H4428><s%> thou <S%H859><s%> wast he that leddest out <S%H3318><s%> and broughtest in <S%H935><s%> <S%H853><s%> Israel: <S%H3478><s%> and the LORD <S%H3068><s%> thy God <S%H430><s%> said <S%H559><s%> unto thee, Thou <S%H859><s%> shalt feed <S%H7462><s%> <S%H853><s%> my people <S%H5971><s%> <S%H853><s%> Israel, <S%H3478><s%> and thou <S%H859><s%> shalt be <S%H1961><s%> ruler <S%H5057><s%> over <S%H5921><s%> my people <S%H5971><s%> Israel. <S%H3478><s%>

Therefore came <S%H935><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> the elders <S%H2205><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> to <S%H413><s%> the king <S%H4428><s%> to Hebron; <S%H2275><s%> and David <S%H1732><s%> made <S%H3772><s%> a covenant <S%H1285><s%> with them in Hebron <S%H2275><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> the LORD; <S%H3068><s%> and they anointed <S%H4886><s%> <S%H853><s%> David <S%H1732><s%> king <S%H4428><s%> over <S%H5921><s%> Israel, <S%H3478><s%> according to the word <S%H1697><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%> by <S%H3027><s%> Samuel. <S%H8050><s%>

And David <S%H1732><s%> and all <S%H3605><s%> Israel <S%H3478><s%> went <S%H1980><s%> to Jerusalem, <S%H3389><s%> which <S%H1931><s%> is Jebus; <S%H2982><s%> where <S%H8033><s%> the Jebusites <S%H2983><s%> were, the inhabitants <S%H3427><s%> of the land. <S%H776><s%>

And the inhabitants <S%H3427><s%> of Jebus <S%H2982><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to David, <S%H1732><s%> Thou shalt not <S%H3808><s%> come <S%H935><s%> hither. <S%H2008><s%> Nevertheless David <S%H1732><s%> took <S%H3920><s%> <S%H853><s%> the castle <S%H4686><s%> of Zion, <S%H6726><s%> which <S%H1931><s%> is the city <S%H5892><s%> of David. <S%H1732><s%>

And David <S%H1732><s%> said, <S%H559><s%> Whosoever <S%H3605><s%> smiteth <S%H5221><s%> the Jebusites <S%H2983><s%> first <S%H7223><s%> shall be <S%H1961><s%> chief <S%H7218><s%> and captain. <S%H8269><s%> So Joab <S%H3097><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Zeruiah <S%H6870><s%> went first up, <S%H5927><s%> <S%H7223><s%> and was <S%H1961><s%> chief. <S%H7218><s%>
And David <S%H1732><s%> dwelt <S%H3427><s%> in the castle; <S%H4679><s%> therefore <S%H5921><s%> <S%H3651><s%> they called <S%H7121><s%> it the city <S%H5892><s%> of David. <S%H1732><s%>

And he built <S%H1129><s%> the city <S%H5892><s%> round about, <S%H4480><s%> <S%H5439><s%> even from <S%H4480><s%> Millo <S%H4407><s%> round about: <S%H5439><s%> and Joab <S%H3097><s%> repaired <S%H2421><s%> <S%H853><s%> the rest <S%H7605><s%> of the city. <S%H5892><s%>
So David <S%H1732><s%> waxed greater and greater: <S%H1980><s%> <S%H1980><s%> <S%H1431><s%> for the LORD <S%H3068><s%> of hosts <S%H6635><s%> was with <S%H5973><s%> him.

These <S%H428><s%> also are the chief <S%H7218><s%> of the mighty men <S%H1368><s%> whom <S%H834><s%> David <S%H1732><s%> had, who strengthened themselves <S%H2388><s%> with <S%H5973><s%> him in his kingdom, <S%H4438><s%> and with <S%H5973><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> Israel, <S%H3478><s%> to make him king, <S%H4427><s%> according to the word <S%H1697><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%> concerning <S%H5921><s%> Israel. <S%H3478><s%>

And this <S%H428><s%> is the number <S%H4557><s%> of the mighty men <S%H1368><s%> whom <S%H834><s%> David <S%H1732><s%> had; Jashobeam, <S%H3434><s%> a Hachmonite, <S%H1121><s%> <S%H2453><s%> the chief <S%H7218><s%> of the captains: <S%H7991><s%> he <S%H1931><s%> lifted up <S%H5782><s%> <S%H853><s%> his spear <S%H2595><s%> against <S%H5921><s%> three <S%H7969><s%> hundred <S%H3967><s%> slain <S%H2491><s%> by him at one <S%H259><s%> time. <S%H6471><s%>

And after <S%H310><s%> him was Eleazar <S%H499><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Dodo, <S%H1734><s%> the Ahohite, <S%H266><s%> who <S%H1931><s%> was one of the three <S%H7969><s%> mighty men. <S%H1368><s%>

He <S%H1931><s%> was <S%H1961><s%> with <S%H5973><s%> David <S%H1732><s%> at Pas-dammim, <S%H6450><s%> and there <S%H8033><s%> the Philistines <S%H6430><s%> were gathered together <S%H622><s%> to battle, <S%H4421><s%> where was <S%H1961><s%> a parcel <S%H2513><s%> of ground <S%H7704><s%> full <S%H4392><s%> of barley; <S%H8184><s%> and the people <S%H5971><s%> fled <S%H5127><s%> from before <S%H4480><s%> <S%H6440><s%> the Philistines. <S%H6430><s%>

And they set themselves <S%H3320><s%> in the midst <S%H8432><s%> of that parcel, <S%H2513><s%> and delivered <S%H5337><s%> it, and slew <S%H5221><s%> <S%H853><s%> the Philistines; <S%H6430><s%> and the LORD <S%H3068><s%> saved <S%H3467><s%> them by a great <S%H1419><s%> deliverance. <S%H8668><s%>

Now three <S%H7969><s%> of <S%H4480><s%> the thirty <S%H7970><s%> captains <S%H7218><s%> went down <S%H3381><s%> to <S%H5921><s%> the rock <S%H6697><s%> to <S%H413><s%> David, <S%H1732><s%> into <S%H413><s%> the cave <S%H4631><s%> of Adullam; <S%H5725><s%> and the host <S%H4264><s%> of the Philistines <S%H6430><s%> encamped <S%H2583><s%> in the valley <S%H6010><s%> of Rephaim. <S%H7497><s%>
And David <S%H1732><s%> was then <S%H227><s%> in the hold, <S%H4686><s%> and the Philistines' <S%H6430><s%> garrison <S%H5333><s%> was then <S%H227><s%> at Bethlehem. <S%H1035><s%>

And David <S%H1732><s%> longed, <S%H183><s%> and said, <S%H559><s%> Oh that <S%H4310><s%> one would give me drink <S%H8248><s%> of the water <S%H4325><s%> of the well <S%H4480><s%> <S%H953><s%> of Bethlehem, <S%H1035><s%> that <S%H834><s%> is at the gate! <S%H8179><s%>

And the three <S%H7969><s%> broke through <S%H1234><s%> the host <S%H4264><s%> of the Philistines, <S%H6430><s%> and drew <S%H7579><s%> water <S%H4325><s%> out of the well <S%H4480><s%> <S%H953><s%> of Bethlehem, <S%H1035><s%> that <S%H834><s%> was by the gate, <S%H8179><s%> and took <S%H5375><s%> it, and brought <S%H935><s%> it to <S%H413><s%> David: <S%H1732><s%> but David <S%H1732><s%> would <S%H14><s%> not <S%H3808><s%> drink <S%H8354><s%> of it, but poured it out <S%H5258><s%> <S%H853><s%> to the LORD, <S%H3068><s%>

And said, <S%H559><s%> My God <S%H4480><s%> <S%H430><s%> forbid it <S%H2486><s%> me, that I should do <S%H4480><s%> <S%H6213><s%> this thing: <S%H2063><s%> shall I drink <S%H8354><s%> the blood <S%H1818><s%> of these <S%H428><s%> men <S%H376><s%> that have put their lives <S%H5315><s%> in jeopardy? for <S%H3588><s%> with the jeopardy of their lives <S%H5315><s%> they brought <S%H935><s%> it. Therefore he would <S%H14><s%> not <S%H3808><s%> drink <S%H8354><s%> it. These things <S%H428><s%> did <S%H6213><s%> these three <S%H7969><s%> mightiest. <S%H1368><s%>

And Abishai <S%H52><s%> the brother <S%H251><s%> of Joab, <S%H3097><s%> he <S%H1931><s%> was <S%H1961><s%> chief <S%H7218><s%> of the three: <S%H7969><s%> for lifting up <S%H5782><s%> <S%H853><s%> his spear <S%H2595><s%> against <S%H5921><s%> three <S%H7969><s%> hundred, <S%H3967><s%> he <S%H1931><s%> slew <S%H2491><s%> them, and had a name <S%H8034><s%> among the three. <S%H7969><s%>

Of <S%H4480><s%> the three, <S%H7969><s%> he was more honorable <S%H3513><s%> than the two; <S%H8147><s%> for he was <S%H1961><s%> their captain: <S%H8269><s%> howbeit he attained <S%H935><s%> not <S%H3808><s%> to <S%H5704><s%> the first three. <S%H7969><s%>

Benaiah <S%H1141><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Jehoiada, <S%H3111><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of a valiant <S%H2428><s%> man <S%H376><s%> of <S%H4480><s%> Kabzeel, <S%H6909><s%> who had done many <S%H7227><s%> acts; <S%H6467><s%> he <S%H1931><s%> slew <S%H5221><s%> <S%H853><s%> two <S%H8147><s%> lionlike men <S%H739><s%> of Moab: <S%H4124><s%> also he <S%H1931><s%> went down <S%H3381><s%> and slew <S%H5221><s%> <S%H853><s%> a lion <S%H738><s%> in <S%H8432><s%> a pit <S%H953><s%> in a snowy <S%H7950><s%> day. <S%H3117><s%>

And he <S%H1931><s%> slew <S%H5221><s%> <S%H853><s%> an Egyptian, <S%H376><s%> <S%H4713><s%> a man <S%H376><s%> of great stature, <S%H4060><s%> five <S%H2568><s%> cubits <S%H520><s%> high; and in the Egyptian's <S%H4713><s%> hand <S%H3027><s%> was a spear <S%H2595><s%> like a weaver's <S%H707><s%> beam; <S%H4500><s%> and he went down <S%H3381><s%> to <S%H413><s%> him with a staff, <S%H7626><s%> and plucked <S%H1497><s%> <S%H853><s%> the spear <S%H2595><s%> out of the Egyptian's hand, <S%H4480><s%> <S%H3027><s%> <S%H4713><s%> and slew <S%H2026><s%> him with his own spear. <S%H2595><s%>

These <S%H428><s%> things did <S%H6213><s%> Benaiah <S%H1141><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Jehoiada, <S%H3111><s%> and had the name <S%H8034><s%> among the three <S%H7969><s%> mighty men. <S%H1368><s%>

Behold, <S%H2009><s%> he <S%H1931><s%> was honorable <S%H3513><s%> among <S%H4480><s%> the thirty, <S%H7970><s%> but attained <S%H935><s%> not <S%H3808><s%> to <S%H413><s%> the first three: <S%H7969><s%> and David <S%H1732><s%> set <S%H7760><s%> him over <S%H5921><s%> his guard. <S%H4928><s%>

Also the valiant men <S%H1368><s%> of the armies <S%H2428><s%> were, Asahel <S%H6214><s%> the brother <S%H251><s%> of Joab, <S%H3097><s%> Elhanan <S%H445><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Dodo <S%H1734><s%> of Bethlehem, <S%H4480><s%> <S%H1035><s%>
Shammoth <S%H8054><s%> the Harorite, <S%H2033><s%> Helez <S%H2503><s%> the Pelonite, <S%H6397><s%>
Ira <S%H5896><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Ikkesh <S%H6142><s%> the Tekoite, <S%H8621><s%> Abiezer <S%H44><s%> the Antothite, <S%H6069><s%>
Sibbecai <S%H5444><s%> the Hushathite, <S%H2843><s%> Ilai <S%H5866><s%> the Ahohite, <S%H266><s%>
Maharai <S%H4121><s%> the Netophathite, <S%H5200><s%> Heled <S%H2466><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Baanah <S%H1196><s%> the Netophathite, <S%H5200><s%>

Ithai <S%H863><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Ribai <S%H7380><s%> of Gibeah, <S%H4480><s%> <S%H1390><s%> that pertained to the children <S%H1121><s%> of Benjamin, <S%H1144><s%> Benaiah <S%H1141><s%> the Pirathonite, <S%H6553><s%>
Hurai <S%H2360><s%> of the brooks <S%H4480><s%> <S%H5158><s%> of Gaash, <S%H1608><s%> Abiel <S%H22><s%> the Arbathite, <S%H6164><s%>
Azmaveth <S%H5820><s%> the Baharumite, <S%H978><s%> Eliahba <S%H455><s%> the Shaalbonite, <S%H8170><s%>
The sons <S%H1121><s%> of Hashem <S%H2044><s%> the Gizonite, <S%H1493><s%> Jonathan <S%H3129><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Shage <S%H7681><s%> the Hararite, <S%H2043><s%>
Ahiam <S%H279><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Sacar <S%H7940><s%> the Hararite, <S%H2043><s%> Eliphal <S%H465><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Ur, <S%H218><s%>
Hepher <S%H2660><s%> the Mecherathite, <S%H4382><s%> Ahijah <S%H281><s%> the Pelonite, <S%H6397><s%>
Hezro <S%H2695><s%> the Carmelite, <S%H3761><s%> Naarai <S%H5293><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Ezbai, <S%H229><s%>
Joel <S%H3100><s%> the brother <S%H251><s%> of Nathan, <S%H5416><s%> Mibhar <S%H4006><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Haggeri, <S%H1905><s%>

Zelek <S%H6768><s%> the Ammonite, <S%H5984><s%> Naharai <S%H5171><s%> the Berothite, <S%H1307><s%> the armorbearer <S%H5375><s%> <S%H3627><s%> of Joab <S%H3097><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Zeruiah, <S%H6870><s%>
Ira <S%H5896><s%> the Ithrite, <S%H3505><s%> Gareb <S%H1619><s%> the Ithrite, <S%H3505><s%>
Uriah <S%H223><s%> the Hittite, <S%H2850><s%> Zabad <S%H2066><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Ahlai, <S%H304><s%>
Adina <S%H5721><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Shiza <S%H7877><s%> the Reubenite, <S%H7206><s%> a captain <S%H7218><s%> of the Reubenites, <S%H7206><s%> and thirty <S%H7970><s%> with <S%H5921><s%> him,
Hanan <S%H2605><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Maachah, <S%H4601><s%> and Joshaphat <S%H3146><s%> the Mithnite, <S%H4981><s%>
Uzzia <S%H5814><s%> the Ashterathite, <S%H6254><s%> Shama <S%H8091><s%> and Jehiel <S%H3273><s%> the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Hothan <S%H2369><s%> the Aroerite, <S%H6200><s%>
Jediael <S%H3043><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Shimri, <S%H8113><s%> and Joha <S%H3109><s%> his brother, <S%H251><s%> the Tizite, <S%H8491><s%>

Eliel <S%H447><s%> the Mahavite, <S%H4233><s%> and Jeribai, <S%H3403><s%> and Joshaviah, <S%H3145><s%> the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Elnaam, <S%H493><s%> and Ithmah <S%H3495><s%> the Moabite, <S%H4125><s%>
Eliel, <S%H447><s%> and Obed, <S%H5744><s%> and Jasiel <S%H3300><s%> the Mesobaite. <S%H4677><s%>
